svg.title: Continuous Planning Feedback Loop - Adaptive Planning Learning System
svg.desc: Continuous improvement system that learns from planning outcomes, team feedback, and delivery results to optimize future planning accuracy and effectiveness with multi-source feedback collection and AI-powered recommendations
svg.text: Adaptive Planning Learning System - Multi-Source Feedback & AI-Powered Process Optimization

g.text: High Confidence: Sprint planning accuracy improves 23% when team feedback exceeds 8.0/10
Recommendation: Prioritize team satisfaction in planning sessions (92% confidence)
Medium Confidence: External dependency tracking reduces delivery delays by 18%
Recommendation: Implement automated dependency monitoring (78% confidence)
Learning in Progress: Historical patterns suggest seasonal velocity variations
Status: Collecting more data for pattern validation (45% confidence)
Next milestone: Advanced Analytics implementation in 3 weeks
